title: James Corden keeps it casual in head-to-toe sweats while out running errands in Los Angeles
text:
He's usually dressed to the nines while hosting The Late Late Show on weeknights.

James Corden departed from his televised style with some low-key sweats during a stroll on Monday.

The 41–year–old actor and comedian was out and about in Los Angeles' swanky Brentwood neighborhood as he ran errands.

On the go: James Corden departed from his televised style with some low-key sweats during a stroll on Monday in Los Angeles' swanky Brentwood neighborhood

James was dressed top–to–bottom in a comfy-looking tracksuit.

He matched a pair of gray sweatpants with a gray zip-up hoodie featuring white panels on his sides and beige sections over his shoulders.

The late night funny man carried along a reusable water bottle and had his standard closely-cropped stubble.

He completed his outfit with a sporty pair of off-white Nike trainers.

Gray day: James was dressed top–to–bottom in a comfy-looking tracksuit featuring a pair of gray sweatpants

Athleisure: He also had on a gray zip-up hoodie featuring white panels on his sides and beige sections over his shoulders, plus a pair of sporty off-white Nike trainers

After his walk, the Carpool Karaoke star drove away in his car, possibly while belting out one of his favorite tunes.

James' outing came only days after he announced he'd be taking a tour of Australia in 2021 and filming multiple episodes of The Late Late Show down under, according to the Sunday Telegraph.

He has reportedly invited Australian A-listers including Chris Hemsworth and Margot Robbie to record Carpool Karaoke segments to be broadcast during the run.

New gig: James' outing came only days after he announced he'd be taking a tour of Australia in 2021 and filming multiple episodes of The Late Late Show down under, according to the Sunday Telegraph

Star power: He'll reportedly try to film his regular Carpool Karaoke segments with Australian A-listers including Margot Robbie and Chris Hemsworth

Despite his busy work schedule, the Wrong Mans star will be stepping into a new role as producer of an upcoming Disney reboot of Cinderella.

The film studio produced a live-action reboot starring Lily James and Cate Blanchett in 2015, but it has already started working on a new version centered around singer Camila Cabello and featuring Pose star Billy Porter as her Fairy Godmother.

He'll also be in front of the camera for Ryan Murphy's upcoming film adaptation of the Tony-nominated musical The Prom with co-stars Meryl Streep and Kerry Washington.
description: James Corden was dressed casually in gray sweats and a matching hoodie as he strolled through LA's swanky Brentwood neighborhood while running errands on Monday.
